remarks: Value of the linear span of a subset of Hilbert space.  The span is the intersection of all subspaces constraining the subset.  Definition of span in [Schechter] p. 276.  (Contributed by NM, 2-Jun-2004.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Dec-2013.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
spanval $p |- ( A C_ ~H -> ( span ` A ) = |^| { x e. SH | A C_ x } ) $.
$d A x $.
